body:
in the United States. Subsequently it was found to be in many other countries. Live vaccines have been used (9) .

No distinct movement has been noted, but epizootiological studies have been made (7, 16) and birds may be involved as carriers (13) .

A profusion of methods of diagnosis has been re ported in the literature. AGID (2, 15) , CIE(3), VN (1,5), IFA (1, 8) , CF (15), HA (11, 14) , microneutralization (8), IP (10), and recently ELISA (4) has been developed as well as an improved VN test (12) .

H. Map credits: Current literature.
